pullRequest.title: Implement transparency through theme selection
pullRequest.bodyText:
Additionally attempt to switch it off by default on Sailfish OS
Solves the c:geo start problem on Sailfish OS (part of #8752 )

nodes.bodyText: Should we really include this line always to system information? IMHO it would be enough to show "Sailfish OS detected!" only when it is really detected. As 99% will not have Sailfish anyway...
